content: size approx 69 across top edge 31½ from center back neck to bottom point materials manos del uruguay fino 70% extrafine merino 30% silk approx 100g/490 yds 1 skip mc plus 1 mini-skein set shown in 438 poison mc with set #5 eleanor 413 rosewater cc1 421 havisham cc2 411 pocketwatch cc3 420 boudoir cc4 410 garnet brooch cc5 us 6/4mm ndls 29 or longer or size to obtain gauge 2 ring markers gauge 17 sts and 32 row = 4 over stripe pattern blocked see notes notes - 17 sts and 32 row = 4 is a blocked gauge before blocking my gauge was 24 sts and 40 row = 4 because of the silk content fino relaxes quite a lot in blocking if your gauge is too big before blocking you may run out of yarn - shawl is worked in 2-row stripes there s no need to cut yarn at every color change carry color not in use up side of work making sure not to pull it too tight
